title: Timothy Spall Takes On Painter J.M.W. Turner, A 'Master Of The Sublime'
teaser: Spall had to "dig deep" to play the title role in Mr. Turner, which is now out on DVD. The 19th century painter was a "man of massive contradictions," he says. Originally broadcast Dec. 15, 2014.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
